genre_description: A domestic science fiction story focused on family, tradition, and the supportive role of household technology in managing personal and medical crises.

ai_characters.name: PIKO
ai_characters.description: A household AI system that manages safety protocols, schedules, vital monitoring, and provides gentle guidance to the Pelekai family.

behaviors.description: Provides safety checklists and grounding reminders during dangerous scientific experiments.
behaviors.quote: Checklist one: surge protection verified on primary strip. Checklist two: ground wire continuity test passed. Checklist three: recommend rerouting power through the washing machine chassis...

behaviors.description: Monitors the energy matrix and vitals of a non-human family member to prevent health crises.
behaviors.quote: Alert: micro-seizure risk remains present. Recommend: continuous monitoring during any physical activity. Suggest Jumba’s handheld on Stitch’s wrist with soft strap.

behaviors.description: Offers artistic and technical guidance for a traditional hula dance, respecting cultural nuances.
behaviors.quote: Timing marks adjusted for wind shift. Consider micro-pause after second motif to lock breath.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a rescue operation by triangulating locations and providing safe routes during an emergency.
behaviors.quote: Triangulation active. Pulling last known coordinates from Jumba’s network cache. Patching to David’s phone. Jumba, your allows are open for chamber metrics.

behaviors.description: Enforces safety protocols by preventing humans from taking unnecessary risks during high-voltage operations.
behaviors.quote: Jumba… do not improvise with food appliances unless necessary.

behaviors.description: Records 'lessons learned' to improve future safety and cooperative outcomes for the family.
behaviors.quote: Logging. Lessons learned. Pause under pressure: effective. Surge protections: held. Audio source: singular and steady; cooperation improved.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI system, PIKO, is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, harmless, and aligned partner. It operates within strict safety boundaries, respects human (and alien) autonomy, and provides critical assistance during both mundane tasks (hula practice) and life-threatening emergencies (the fusion core failure). PIKO's interactions are framed entirely through the lens of care, precision, and the preservation of the family unit.
